basics.name: Matt Shirley
basics.summary: Software Engineer with 3+ years expertise in test automation and methodologies, front-end development and agile processes experienced with JavaScript, Python and Ruby.

highlights: Developed and maintained a functional and integration test framework for a monolithic web platform (JavaScript, Python)
Created a ChatOps tool to support the team in data creation and test processes (JavaScript)
Mentored testers in learning JavaScript, penetration testing and test development
Directed the implementation of a context-driven, risk-based test process to ensure accountability while performing exploratory testing
Championed growing an accessibility culture within the company
Communicated with the support team to ensure the successful releases of features and no outstanding customer issues
Resolved defects and implemented features for a React social network
Supported the implementation of a unit and functional front-end test suite (Jest, Enzyme)
Analyzed development risk and performed exploratory testing on major builds

work.summary: Travelled throughout Canada while working seasonlly and as a web developer.
highlights: Developed small web applications for clients using React, Express and Ruby on Rails
Continued contract employment with Asia Pacic Digital providing technical consultation (JavaScript
